snippet: MSNBC.com has become NBCNews.com, ending the site’s brand confusion with the cable channel of the same name and signifying that NBC’s long relationship with Microsoft is over.
abstract: MSNBC.com renames itself NBCNews.com, ending the site’s brand confusion with the cable channel of the same name and signifying that NBC’s long relationship with Microsoft is over; NBC's parent Comcast is acquiring Microsoft's stake in the joint venture for $300 million; moves come at a time when television news operations are increasingly looking online for advertising dollars and new audiences.
lead_paragraph: MSNBC.com has become NBCNews.com, ending the site’s brand confusion with the cable channel of the same name and signifying that NBC’s long relationship with Microsoft is over.

headline.seo: MSNBC.com Renamed to NBCNews.com as Microsoft and NBC Divorce
headline.main: Microsoft and NBC Complete Web Divorce
headline.print_headline: Microsoft And NBC Complete Web Divorce
